= Class *jplex.xprototype.Element*  =

== Description ==
jPlex's XPrototype extended DOM Element



== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `appendChildren(Elements)` || `Element` || Appends all elements listed as arguments to the DOM element<br />  - `Elements <List<&lt;Element&gt;>` to add||
|| `bindKey(key, handler, config)` || `void` || <br />  - `key <object>` - `handler <object>` - `config <object>`||
|| `IEFixCombobox()` || `void` || <br /> ||
|| `isWithin(x, y)` || `Boolean` || Determines wheter the point of coordinates (x,y) on the page is within the element or not<br />  - `x <Integer>` Horizontal coordinate - `y <Integer>` Vertical coordinate||
|| `removeChildren()` || `Element` || Removes all children of the element<br /> ||
|| `unbindKey(key, modifiers)` || `void` || <br />  - `key <object>` - `modifiers <object>`||
